titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning tobacco.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dates are given according to Lady Day dating.
Dated at end: VVhitehall, this fourteenth day of March, in the thirteenth year of Our reign.
Arms 21; Steele notation: loving rein 2) Realme, 3) to 4) hence- service,.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Majestie: and
